## Compiler interface

Compiler service interface

Signature:

```typescript
interface Compiler extends Service
```

Extends: [Service](/api/bud-framework/service)

## Remarks

Compiles and reports on stats, progress, and errors encountered during compilation.

## Properties

| Property                                             | Type              | Description                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [instance](/api/bud-framework/compiler/instance)     | Compiler.Instance | The compiler instance                                        |
| [isCompiled](/api/bud-framework/compiler/iscompiled) | boolean           | <code>true</code> if compiler has already been instantiated. |
| [progress](/api/bud-framework/compiler/progress)     | Compiler.Progress | Contains compilation progress, if avialable                  |
| [stats](/api/bud-framework/compiler/stats)           | StatsCompilation  | Contains compilation stats, if available.                    |

## Methods

| Method                                                       | Description                                                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [before()](/api/bud-framework/compiler/before)               | Callback for <code>before</code> filter                                                                                                    |
| [callback(err, stats)](/api/bud-framework/compiler/callback) | Compilation callback                                                                                                                       |
| [compile()](/api/bud-framework/compiler/compile)             | Returns a [Compiler instance](//bud-framework/compiler/instance) when provided with a valid [Configuration](//bud-framework/configuration) |
